snippet.title: Shutokō Battle '94 Keichii Tsuchiya Drift King (SNES Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Drift King Shutokou Battle '94 (SNES) - Type-S - Loop way

The player controls a stock car across various circuits (highway, race track, driving school or tōge) in either the scenario or the practice mode of the game. It was published by Bullet-Proof Software (BPS). This game is the first of the long-running series of Shutokō Battle games. These games were eventually known under various names abroad including Tokyo Xtreme Racer in North America and Tokyo Highway Challenge in Europe. "Drift King" is the trademarked nickname of Japanese pro racing and former street racing driver Keiichi Tsuchiya.
